price: Na bila shaka Jahannamu ndipo pahali pao walipo ahidiwa wote.
footnotes: Na hakika Moto mkali mno ndio wameahidiwa hao wote kuwa ndiyo adhabu ya kutia uchungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

translations: (is) surely the promised place for them
